name: XTRAQTIV Project Implementation
description: Complete implementation of the XTRAQTIV project components

subtasks.description: Define and implement data models and schemas

subtasks.description: Create comprehensive unit tests for core functionality

subtasks.name: Application Development (xtraqtivApp)
subtasks.description: Implementation of the application layer and user interface

subtasks.description: Develop user interface components and layouts

subtasks.name: Resource Management
subtasks.description: Set up and manage application resources

subtasks.description: Implement state management and data flow

subtasks.name: App Integration Tests

subtasks.name: API Documentation
subtasks.description: Document all public APIs and interfaces

subtasks.name: Project Infrastructure
subtasks.description: Set up and maintain project infrastructure

subtasks.name: CI/CD Pipeline
